Nim ( Bindi Irwin ) , age 14 , is more determined than ever to protect your precious island and home to their beloved pets .
While ambitious and ruthless entrepreneurs hunters threaten the existence of the world that loves , Nim realizes that to save the Island will have to join forces with someone outside , Edmund , who fled the continent . Only with his help , Nim will have a chance to stop the villains from destroying your precious island.
From the producers of The Chronicles of Narnia and inspired by the book Nim's Island , Wendy Orr , Back on the Island of Imagination will delight audiences of all ages . Also starring Matthew Lillard ( Scooby Doo ) .
